MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW9 & WA16 postcode area of Northwich & Knutsford. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:45PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed there is a fault on our overhead line network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:53PM on 18th January 2021
